tool.name: Barplot by group
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**WARNING**.This tool requires **Otuphyl file** get in *Compute otuphyl* tool.\
.. class:: infomark
**What is a barplot?**\
A barplot is a graphics that represents the relationship between a numeric and a categorical variable. Each categorical variable claims one bar and they are represented in Y-axis. Values of every categorical variable appear in X axis.\
**Barplot by group tool**\
*Barplot by group* is a tool that represents abundance by group provided by the data.\
- In X-axis are located different groups of data: H,I and J.\ - In Y-axis is located the abundance represented by percentaje (%).\
In every bar of every group is represented the abundance correspondent to every genus, family or species of bacteria.\
